mainText1: There is a special system of discounts on our website. In order to receive a discount, it is enough to register on the site. After registration, after 3 months the discount will increase (regardless of the number of orders)!
mainText2: We bring to your attention a large selection of quality parts from well-known manufacturers. You can buy spare parts for any car model at a low cost from us. We cooperate with well-known European, Korean, Japanese and Chinese brands, which opens up wide opportunities for each customer to choose the right components and accessories.
mainText3: How to buy spare parts in Minsk at low prices? To find the necessary part, you just need to enter the brand of your car, indicate the year of its production and the name of the product, and the system will present the desired result within a few minutes. We have simplified the search system as much as possible, which allows you to get the desired components in the shortest possible time, without much effort, and without leaving your home. By giving preference to our service, you make a choice in favor of impeccable product quality, flexible terms of cooperation and prompt delivery times. In our catalog you can find: Radiators, oil, fuel and air filters, clutch kits, headlights, spark plugs, body parts - all this and much more can be ordered in our online spare parts store. If necessary, you can call us and ask any question of interest to the consultant. We employ competent specialists who are perfectly knowledgeable about components and accessories for cars. In addition, our employees take into account the individual wishes of each client and help to correctly place an order for the purchase of the necessary spare parts. One of the main advantages of our activity is the ability to supply products to any point in Minsk. Due to the precise and well-functioning work, as well as cooperation with reliable transport companies, buyers can count on the delivery of the necessary auto parts on time. Our company was able to win the trust of customers thanks to the competent and efficient organization of the sales process.
